186011691.review: solid game but could be a bit harder

186002413.review: 플래닛 코스터가 너무 헤비한데 롤러코스터 타이쿤을 좋아하시는 분이라면 필히 추천할만한 게임입니다. 꾸미기 방식은 단순해 보이지만, 모드 적용해서 조금 깊게 들어가면 나름 헤비하게 즐길 수도 있는 깊이 있는 게임입니다. 창작마당을 통해서 쉽게 모드 적용 가능하며, 다른 사람들이 만든 건축물들 보는 재미도 있습니다. 다만, 캠페인에는 조금 문제가 있습니다. 게임내 시간이 너무 빨리 지나가서 미션을 깰때면 일시정지 안하고는 공원 꾸미기까지 하기가 어렵습니다. 그런데 또 일시정지 금지 캠페인도 많습니다. 그래서 늘 미완성된 느낌이 가득할 때 미션을 통과합니다. 그리고 놀이공원 수익의 거의 대부분이 롤러코스터에서 나옵니다. 초보자들은 꼭 공원 시작하자마자 수익 많이 나는 롤러코스터부터 지으세요.(없으면 연구를 해서라도 뽑아야 합니다)

185980682.review: Amazing game, it's the good(!) old version rollercoaster tycoon in a modern jacket.

185936511.review: I'd like it to be fun but one wrong financial decision and you lose

185877993.review:
~100 hours for my wife and I to play through the core campaign.

It scales well for two people to play.  Each person can work on designing a coaster, support infrastructure, or other items semi-independently but working towards a common goal.

185808486.review: very creative and fun to make your own theme park

185543184.review: Fiyat performans günlerrinde kesinlikle kaçırılmaması gereken, sürekli yenilik peşinde koşarak saatler geçirten simülasyon.

185483475.review: RC2 lovingly brought to modern standards.

185438423.review:
플래닛 코스터 사양이 안되서 이거라도 해보자라는 마음에 받았는데 진짜 너무 재밌다...
물론 이리저리 건설하다 보면 플코같은 디테일한 부분이 안되는 것에 대해 아쉬운 점도 많지만 창작마당을 통해 어느정도 대리 해소할 수 있고 건설류나 타이쿤류를 좋아하는 사람이라면 고민없이 추천함

185400955.review: Great roller coaster simulation with a multiplayer so you can build with friends

185347107.review: Really cute theme park builder game! Played it with my best friend in multiplayer. The game still needs polishing, but its really fun and has some unique features, like the immersion aspect and delivery routing aspect.

185291008.review: El mejor juego de creación de Parques de Diversión, debería tener más DLCs. Porque realmente es muy bueno e intuitivo de usar. Vale la pena.

185219427.review:
Parkitect

ein modernisierter Rollercoaster Tycoon mit jeder Menge Wuselfaktor und Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten. Einmal angefangen gerät man schnell in die bunte Welt von Parkitect, unds gibt an jeder Ecke immer irgendwas zu tun. Die Athmosphäre ist stimmig, und es macht in allen Missionen Spaß, während es immer gut zugänglich in Bau und Management bleibt.

Viel Zeit sollte man mitbringen, denn basteln und gestalten dauert länger als mal eben 10 Minuten nebenher. 


Fazit: 10 / 10 einfach ein gutes Spiel, absolut empfehlenswert

185183764.review:
Como inicio diré que  no disfrutaba tanto un juego de gestion de parque de atracciones desde la saga Rollercoaster tycoon.

El estilo es practicamente el mismo, con la gran diferencia de la importancia de los suministros a las tiendas/comercios, que en este caso hay que hacer caminos ( escondidos de cara al publico para no romper con la "magia" ) y puntos para que los limpiadores tiren la basura. Es un toque al comienzo molesto, luego cuando lo sabes gestionar, es una mecanica mas.

Es muy divertido, en la campaña hay algunas partes faciles y otras mas complicadas.

Las montañas rusas ( como en la mayoria ) puedes crearlas tu o bien usar las que ya estan creadas en el juego )

Yo estoy disfrutando mucho y he terminado por comprar los dlc en oferta porque asumo que jugare bastante :D

185125606.review: Most of the scenarios are do-able with only a very few exceptions being difficult. The location of shops is restrictive because you have to keep them supplied from the depot and also the peeps don't like seeing what's going on with supplying these shops. Sometimes money is hard to come by so you have to be patient, which is difficult when you have a deadline to complete. All in all, I enjoyed the game and found it better than Planet Coaster 1.

185118170.review:
A riqueza de uma nação se mede pela riqueza do povo e não pela riqueza dos príncipes.

Adam Smith

185108138.review: 나만의 방법으로 놀이공원을 만들어가는게 재미있고,하다보면 시간이 순삭됌.

185052912.review: To me this game is more addictive than Stardew Valley. I am obsessed with designing theme parks and this game makes everything possible.

185050750.review: Hat mir leider nicht so gut gefallen wie erhofft, deshalb habe ich es wieder zurückgegeben.

185050273.review: This game is really fun. I had it on my old account and now on this as well. I played it many hours. But if you have mods from the Steam Workshop, the possibilities are endless. I love the sandbox mode. Music is nice, grafics are cartoony, easy to navigate. If you like coasters, this is your game!

184912003.review: SUPER FUN AND WORTH IT!! graphic and motion really cute The UX/UI so easy to understand  I HOPE next update have more trick like priority pass lane

184822220.review: Its okay, but the Roblox Rollercoaster Tycoon 2 is much better then Parkitect.

184781299.review:
Unfortunately, not a big fan.

The camera movement was disappointing and frustrating. It made this game strangely feel like it was running on rails, which began to show itself in how planned the economy eventually feels. You begin to catch on to the meta game very quickly, which may be fun for some people, but it wasn't for me. There are mechanics added that I did enjoy, such as all of the environmental pieces and the staff management/delivery routing, but these simply feel like hurdles added in to stretch the numbers-go-up gameplay out.

Another thing that I began to found frustrating was that guests in the park are influenced by 'immersion' which can only be increased by building matching environments using the enviroments tools. This would be okay if the camera wasn't horrible to use. It all feels like a simulation running numbers behind the scenes, and the emergent play never had a chance to well, emerge, like in the original RCT3. I never wanted to actually walk through any of these parks. Simply put, this game feels like it is lacking a soul.

184530285.review:
Schon ewig auf der Liste gehabt, nach 17 Minuten Rückerstattung angefordert.
Wie dumm muss ein Entwicklerteam sein? Das hätte easy das neue RCT werden können, aber nein, ich muss mich damit rumschlagen unterirdische Versorgungslinien zu organisieren. Wenn sie das Feature wieder rausnehmen, bin ich gerne wieder dabei. Aber so killt das ja komplett den Spaß. Merkt man ja auch, wenn man ein gutes Game kopiert, was das nicht hatte, würd ich es jetzt nicht unbedingt reinnehmen. Schade...

184526036.review: Great casual simulation. The multiplayer mode adds depth and is great to play with family!

184520661.review: its a really good park sim game but dear god the camera is miserable and makes it impossible to play - it was 2018, every management game had a camera tilt option by this time unless it was 2d

184494692.review: Juego entretenido y que recuerda mucho al clásico. El modo historia se agradece ya que te va poniendo objetivos, pero que el parque sea mas o menos atractivo ya depende de cada jugador.

184487949.review: Este juego es una joya, lo compre por navidad y no he dejado de jugarlo. Se me ha hecho más difícil de lo esperado pero aun que reinicie mil veces, las ganas de seguir jugando no se van! Aparte tengo una lap normal (no es gamer) y el juego va bastante bien.

184486576.review: One of  best game ever, the only one you can co op compaign missions, so nice in multiplayer

184344135.review: Okay, this game is WAY better than the two Plan Co games. Simpler, yet more complete and offers a lot more resources. Also, the way how the game allows you to get creative with minimal restrictions is just AWESOME. Thank you, Texel Raptor. BUT!, piece of advice here: DO NOT GET CARRIED AWAY BY GREED, PLEASE! Plan all your DLCs and stuff with common sense.

184342565.review: Good fun! A bit buggy when playing multiplayer - quite regular desync issues, but other than that, a really fun game.

184340801.review: Succeeds in every way that Planet Coaster 2 fails (other then pure graphics), particularly in UI, Management and Scale.

184294899.review:
I have a friend who's had people in his park for over 22 years, they have a gauntlet of 324 teacup rides to get through.

I have a kiddie coaster with enough gforces to kill anyone, its my most popular ride

100/10 best game

184189717.review:
Amazing reimagining of the RCT1/2 games! It's everything I ever wanted while staying true to the isometric style unlike how RCT3 went too 3d. 

This game has a lot of charm just makes me smile :)

184165342.review:
Parkitect is everything you loved about Rollercoaster Tycoon 1+2, made for the modern age. 

My only complaint with the game is no quick undo button which would be super helpful when misplacing a prop while building a complex structure.

184106413.review: Brilliant Game, If you ever played Theme Park or Rollercoaster Tychoon, then this is bloody great, Massive selection from the workshop too, and not bogged down with almost necessary DLCs like other similar games. Perfect, fun, and relaxing yet challenging at times, great game.

184097965.review: Massive RCT1 + 2 vibes, with a cute aesthetic. Heavily recommend if a fan of either of those two games.

184078259.review:
This game surprised me in ways I didn't expect and I had originally written it off, I almost didn't accept this gift from a friend.  But it turns out this is my favourite theme park sim, and it's because for the first time in the genre, building is so easy, satisfying and visually tactile that it's like playing with interactive Legos.

Putting down other people's blueprints for rides or buildings feels like you're looking into a ornate and beautifully realized toy diorama that you get to endlessly tinker and edit with, and even though the prop item UI is clumsy, the pipette tool lets you directly clone anything in the world and sidestep that entirely, keeping your focus on the world, and I've found that placing someone else's blueprint acts like a painting palette you get to sample and expand on.

The edits and tweaks it makes to the classic theme park formula are also all smart ones, having to care about cargo distribution means that for the first time you're making functional backlots to a theme park, and the requirement to keep them out of sight of guests means that your theming and décor are being used for an additional functional purpose other than to please guests (and yourself), and it makes that interactive diorama aesthetic all the more satisfying to watch these two halves exist simultaneously.  It also reveals just how half-baked and unfinished Planet Coaster 2's anemic changes to their management system really is.

Full multiplayer support is delightful (even custom music syncing if everyone has the same music files!) as is the robust workshop and modding support, which even though it appears like activity peaked a while ago, still has a lot to offer with extra rides and props.  

My complaints with this game end up being pretty minor, I can only think of three things of note:

- The UI is "fine" but not good, the layouts and use of color are awkward and the prop menu lacks favourites and useful categorization features.
- While most of the visuals have this nice chunky toy-like aesthetic, the guests look like someone's first Blender modelling project and I wish they complimented everything else.
- There's no undo/redo. While it gets easier over time it never stops feeling absent.

This is the first theme park where theming and decoration felt fun, and I reckon that even if you're not into management sims this game could be recommended to anyone looking to express themselves creatively or wanting to tinker with a relaxing digital toy.

184075341.review:
Tutorial is bad. Couldn't even get past the first few minutes of it. No undo button immediately turn me off. A complex game like this need a extremely good and fun tutorial to give a good first impression. The tutorial does the opposite. 

Way too complicated for what it is. Too many things to assemble. Lots of busy works and not much enjoyment doing it.

This is no rollercoaster tycoon. TCT does a lot of of hard work for you so you can enjoy your park. This is the opposite.  It's not a fun game.

Do not buy.

184062571.review:
We probably have over 200 hours in Parkitect, and keep coming back for more. 

It's such a solid Park-sim, that every other sim (RCT, Planet Coaster, etc) are unplayable now. It's a near perfect game. And the devs keep patching and adding stuff despite it being out for several years.

The only negatives I would say is, the camera locking on landscape heights, and the lack of danger in rides killing all occupants. If Texelraptor fixed these issues, I would say it *IS* the perfect game.

184036188.review:
accidentally quit the game and an hour of my progress got deleted without any confirmation or autosave

very fun though, this is the only time this has happened?

183923019.review: Wer RCT 1 und RCT2 geliebt hat, wird dieses Spiel auch lieben. Die Bedienung ist relativ einfach, dennoch komplexer als beim Klassiker, bei dem sich dieses Spiel viel "abgeschaut" hat. Aber im Guten. Hat man es erstmal geschafft in die schwarzen Zahlen zu rutschen, macht dieses Spiel süchtig.  Die Grafik ist nicht ganz real, aber auch nicht kindisch. Insgesamt absolut gelungenes Spiel.

183909233.review:
Parkitect stands out as one of the top theme park management games. It takes the beloved elements of RollerCoaster Tycoon and gives them a modern twist, as the developer intended. As a long-time fan of RCT, I absolutely love the modernized art style.

Building your own park in Parkitect is an absolute delight. The game offers a wide variety of themes and attractions. The building system is intuitive and fun, allowing for endless creativity. The campaign is challenging and the scenarios kept me engaged until the end.

However, the management aspect of the game isn't particularly challenging. While this doesn't bother me personally, those seeking a more intricate management experience might find Parkitect lacking in that regard.

For me, Parkitect is a 10/10

183879353.review:
I think I backed them on a kickstarter campaign many years ago. Nice to see they are still going strong! This is a relaxed and wholesome game to play; Rollercoaster Tycoon 2.0 in a modern style.

I like the co-op mode, playing this with my girlfriend sometimes.  Just chill and build some parks!

183778457.review: I recommend this game if you like design and business management

183746240.review: [h1] 플코는 어렵고. 롤코타는 너무 구식이라고 생각한다면 이 게임을 해라. [/h1]

183720423.review: As someone who has tried most of the big park building games that have been released since the original RCT days, I can safely say that this is definitely one of the best. Shout out to the campaign mode, which is also one of the best in these types of games.

183646908.review: This game is so freakin fun. I love it!

183525901.review: Successor to the original Roller Coaster Tycoons. Adds a few more elements, but doesn't over complicate it like the rivals. One big complaint is you can't hide supports while building rides, making putting together large wooden roller coasters a challenging endeavor as you have to try and guess where your track is and where it will end up.
